Localization.DescDemo:
DEMO
Run the application in which you can view the finished reports, as well as to open the designer and try your skills at creating your own ones.
Localization.DescDocumentation:
DOCUMENTATION
Start using the reporting tool with reading the user manual. This is necessary to improve your knowledge and experience in creating reports of any complexity.
Localization.DescForum:
FORUM
Join a users community and discuss issues related to the software. On the message board you can share your experience with other forum participants.
Localization.DescSampleProject:
SAMPLE PROJECT
In this section you can find lots of project ideas using the report generator. You are able to immediately put them into practice in your applications.
Localization.DescSupport:
SUPPORT
Something goes wrong with your reports? Ask our technical managers. Experienced professionals are ready to relieve the problems and issues you may have.
Localization.DescVideo:
VIDEO
Dozens of clips to create reports of any complexity are available on our website. For easy viewing, video tutorials are thematically joined into categories.
Localization.WelcomeDesc:
We are pleased you are running now reporting tool Stimulsoft Reports.Net. The product is carefully designed for WinForms and used for creating reports of a high quality for you, your business and your customers. An exciting moment is coming! In a few moments you will be able to start designing your own reports.

Have a good time in making the first steps with Stimulsoft Reports.

Report.name: Simple List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple list report.

video.name: How to Create Simple List
How to Create List Report
How to Create Report Using Dictionary
How to Use Word Wrap and Grow to Height

Report.name: Two Simple Lists
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create two simple list reports.

video.name: How to Create MultiPage Report
video.desc: Basic steps for this video are described in the User Manual the section Getting Started. The user manual is delivered in the product installation pack.

Report.name: Highlight Condition
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to use highlight condition to create a report.

video.name: How to Create Report with Highlight Condition
How to create Report with Highlight Condition
How to create Report with Hightlight Condition using Styles
How to Create Report with Conditions (Assigning Expression)

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with shapes.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with images.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with watermark.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with Bar-Codes.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with using HTML tags.

Report.name: Invoice
Report.desc: A simple invoice.

Report.name: Multi-Column List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns. To create a report with columns set the Columns property of a page to two or more.

video.desc: Basic steps for this video are described in the User Manual the section Getting Started. The user manual is delivered in the product installation pack.

video.name: How to Create Report with Columns 1
How to Create Report with Columns 2

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns on the bands. Multicolumn direction - across then down.

video.desc: Basic steps for this video are described in the User Manual the section Getting Started. The user manual is delivered in the product installation pack.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with multiple columns on the bands. Multicolumn direction - down then across.

video.desc: Basic steps for this video are described in the User Manual the section Getting Started. The user manual is delivered in the product installation pack.

Report.name: Two Masters on One Detail
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with two master-detail links. And detail for both links is the same.

Report.name: Master-Detail with zero Height
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a Master-Detail report in which one of the bands has the zero height.

Report.name: Master-Detail on DataBand
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a Master-Detail report in which one of the bands is placed on another one.

video.desc: Basic steps for this video are described in the User Manual the section Getting Started. The user manual is delivered in the product installation pack.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to sort group by its totals.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a Master-Detail report with groups.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple group report with two columns on a page.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create groups with ranges in a report.

Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple group report with multiple columns on the bands. Multicolumn direction - across then down.

Report.name: Two Segments on Width
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with the width of some pages. Use the SegmentPerWidth and SegmentPerHeight properties to set the number of segments of a page.

video.name: How to Create Report with Cross-Tab on Page and Segments
video.desc: Basic steps for this video are described in the User Manual the section Getting Started. The user manual is delivered in the product installation pack.

Report.name: Unlimited Height
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to create a report with the unlimited height. Use the UnlimitedHeight property to set the unlimited height of a page.

Report.name: Group and List
Report.desc: This sample demonstrates how to combine printing of a list and group.
